channel.title: FunPk Problem
channel.description:
Hello.
I have a problem with my FunPk Area..
When i kill someone, than he gets teleported to the "Safed" FunPk Zone..
But I see him next to me..
Umm.. Short: I kill someone in FunPk Area.. on [i][b]HIS[/b][/i] screen he gets teleported.. on [i][b]MY[/b][/i] screen i can't see that he gets teleported (i see him next to me)
Can someone help me how to fix this?
[u]My Source:[/u] Allstar Scape
MfG. :)

item.title: FunPk Problem
item.dc:creator: @Destroyed_32 Destroyed 32
item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

Sorry that i am so stupid

I don’t know what to do lol :o

[code] // If killed apply dead
if ((absX >= 2369 && absX <= 2425 && absY >= 5125 && absY <= 5167 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
IsDead = false;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
currentHealth = playerLevel[3];
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
refreshSkills();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
teleportToX = 2399;
teleportToY = 5172;
sendMessage(“Oh dear, your dead… But you don’t loose stuff!”);
}

    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();
    }[/code]

Edit the code please, that i just need to Copy and Paste it

Mfg :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2009, 12:45:37 pm[/size][hr]Can noone help me? :o

It would be nice when someone help me with my Problem… Coz it’s really nooby that bug

MfG

Read full topic

item.title: FunPk Problem
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Just make the player update in the applyDead() or youDied() method.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Destroyed_32 wrote:

What is the command (or umm… the line) for it?

item.title: FunPk Problem
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I think it’s just a player update glitch. Make sure that your player updates when he dies.

Read full topic
